intpg_set_error_verbosity intverbosity
intpg_set_error_verbosity resourceconnection intverbosity
pg_set_error_verbosity determines the verbosity of messages returned by pg_last_error and pg_result_error. The verbosity can be one of three constants: PGSQL_ERRORS_TERSE, PGSQL_ERRORS_DEFAULT or PGSQL_ERRORS_VERBOSE.
pg_set_error_verbosity will return the connection previous verbosity.
This function requires PostgreSQL 7.4 or higher. Changing the verbosity in this manner will only affect future results, existing result objects will be unchanged.
